original: apply subcode_cons_invert_right in H. split. - destruct H as [H1 | H1]. + destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. split; [auto|]. apply subcode_trans with (Q := (i, l)); auto. + destruct H1 as [H1 H2]. split; [auto|]. apply subcode_trans with (Q := (S i, l)); auto. - destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply subcode_cons_invert_right in H2. destruct H2 as [H2 | H2]; [contradiction| auto].
